AccountPlanObjectiveMeasure.name: AccountPlanObjectiveMeasure
AccountPlanObjectiveMeasure.description: Represents the performance of target metrics for an objective associated with the account plan.

AccountPlanObjMeasCalcDefId.description: The account plan objective calculation definition associated with the measure.

AccountPlanObjectiveId.description: The account plan objective associated with the measure.

CurrentCurrencyValue.description: The current value in currency for a measure associated with the account plan objective.

CurrentNumberValue.description: The current numerical value for a measure associated with the account plan objective.

CurrentPercentValue.description: The current value in percentage for a measure associated with the account plan objective.

CurrentValue.description: The current value for a measure associated with the account plan objective.

CurrentValueTimestamp.description: The date and time that the current value was last updated. This field is available in API version 63.0 and later.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the account plan objective measure.

TargetCurrencyValue.description: The target value in currency for a measure associated with the account plan objective.

TargetNumberValue.description: The target numerical value for a measure associated with the account plan objective.

TargetPercentValue.description: The target value in percentage for a measure associated with the account plan objective.

TargetValue.description: The target value for a measure associated with the account plan objective.

ValueType.description: Specifies the type of value that's measured.
